body:
Wow, this looks like a fantastic program(me)! Some new names as well as old reliables. Excellent. I'm with Mostapha and Chris, if this could be webcast that would be awesome, but failing that I'll settle for the slide decks eventually. Congrats to Nicholas for getting a fully packed schedule! Seems to me that the Radiance community is as active and vibrant as ever.

- Rob

________________________________________
Sent: Monday, September 03, 2012 8:58 AM
To: Radiance general discussion
P.S.  Forgot to include the workshop web page in case you don't have it handy:

http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop11/

The deadline for registration has officially passed, though you can ask Nicolas for special permission if you have extenuating circumstances.  I understand there are about 50 registrants at this point, and we may be reaching venue capacity as well!
_______________________________________________
Radiance-general mailing list
Radiance-general at radiance-online.org
http://www.radiance-online.org/mailman/listinfo/radiance-general
subject: Re: [Radiance-general] Full workshop ahead!
